title: Could Saudi Arabia be the new hub for multinational companies’ profit shifting?
description: Saudi Arabia’s estimated real GDP of approximately $1.085 trillion in 2024, representing a growth of 1.3% over the previous year, could experience further enhancement through strategic profit-shifting policies for major multinational companies.

title: Using the GPR Index to Guide Investment Strategies in Iran-Israel Tensions
description: The Israel-Iran war provides a real-world example to examine how different asset classes respond to heightened geopolitical risk and which ones serve as effective hedges in investment decision.
